title: NeutronMsg
description: A number of Custom messages that can call into the Neutron bindings.

oneOf.description: RegisterInterchainAccount registers an interchain account on remote chain.

connection_id.description: *connection_id** is an IBC connection identifier between Neutron and remote chain.

interchain_account_id.description: **interchain_account_id** is an identifier of your new interchain account. Can be any string. This identifier allows contracts to have multiple interchain accounts on remote chains.

oneOf.description: SubmitTx starts the process of executing any Cosmos-SDK *msgs* on remote chain.

connection_id.description: *connection_id** is an IBC connection identifier between Neutron and remote chain.

fee.description: **fee** is an ibc fee for the transaction.

interchain_account_id.description: *interchain_account_id** is an identifier of your interchain account from which you want to execute msgs.

memo.description: *memo** is a memo you want to attach to your interchain transaction.It behaves like a memo in usual Cosmos transaction.

msgs.description: *msgs** is a list of protobuf encoded Cosmos-SDK messages you want to execute on remote chain.

timeout.description: *timeout** is a timeout in seconds after which the packet times out.

connection_id.description: *connection_id** is an IBC connection identifier between Neutron and remote chain.

keys.description: *keys** is the KV-storage keys for which we want to get values from remote chain.

query_type.description: *query_type** is a query type identifier ('tx' or 'kv' for now).

transactions_filter.description: *transactions_filter** is the filter for transaction search ICQ.

update_period.description: *update_period** is used to say how often the query must be updated.

new_keys.description: *new_keys** is the new query keys to retrive.

new_transactions_filter.description: *new_transactions_filter** is a new transactions filter of the query.

new_update_period.description: *new_update_period** is a new update period of the query.

query_id.description: *query_id** is the ID of the query we want to update.
*query_id** is ID of the query we want to remove.

oneOf.description: IbcTransfer sends a fungible token packet over IBC.
SubmitAdminProposal sends a proposal to neutron's Admin module. This type of messages can be only executed by Neutron DAO.

AdminProposal.description: AdminProposal defines the struct for various proposals which Neutron may accept. Currently only parameter change proposals are implemented, new types of admin proposals may be implemented in future.

param_change_proposal.description: *param_change_proposal** is a parameter change proposal field.

Binary.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>. See also <https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/blob/main/docs/MESSAGE_TYPES.md>.

KVKey.description: Describes a KV key for which you want to get value from the storage on remote chain

key.description: *key** is a key you want to read from the storage

path.description: *path** is a path to the storage (storage prefix) where you want to read value by key (usually name of cosmos-sdk module: 'staking', 'bank', etc.)

ParamChange.description: ParamChange defines the struct for parameter change request.

key.description: *key** is a name of parameter. Unique for subspace.

subspace.description: *subspace** is a key of module to which the parameter to change belongs. Unique for each module.

value.description: *value** is a new value for given parameter. Non unique.

ParamChangeProposal.description: ParamChangeProposal defines the struct for single parameter change proposal.

description.description: *descriptionr** is a text description of proposal. Non unique.

param_changes.description: *param_changes** is a vector of params to be changed. Non unique.

title.description: *title** is a text title of proposal. Non unique.

ProtobufAny.description: Type for wrapping any protobuf message

type_url.description: *type_url** describes the type of the serialized message

value.description: *value** must be a valid serialized protocol buffer of the above specified type
